name: ugrep
description: Ultra fast grep with query UI, fuzzy search, archive search, and more

repo.name: ugrep
repo.description: 🔍 ugrep 7.5 file pattern searcher -- a user-friendly, faster, more capable grep replacement. Includes a TUI, Google-like Boolean search with AND/OR/NOT, fuzzy search, hexdumps, searches (nested) archives (zip, 7z, tar, pax, cpio), compressed files (gz, Z, bz2, lzma, xz, lz4, zstd, brotli), pdfs, docs, and more

readme.summary: Excellent explanation of features and use cases with extensive examples, but completely missing installation instructions and troubleshooting guidance.
readme.top_issue: No installation instructions provided - users cannot actually install the package based on this README alone

security.summary: The provided code appears to be secure, with no major injection risks or secrets exposure, but could benefit from additional input validation and error handling.

common_complaints: Feature parity issues with grep/ripgrep (Pzo flags, regex complexity limits)
Pattern matching edge cases (process substitution, fuzzy search complexity)
Matching accuracy bugs (only-matching with AND patterns)
praise_themes: Broader feature set than standard grep
sentiment.summary: Community shows moderate technical engagement with specific feature requests and bug reports, but slow maintainer responsiveness (oldest issues from July 2025, newest from January 2026 with zero comments), combined with unresolved bugs including a heap buffer overflow, suggests potential abandonment or insufficient maintenance capacity.

red_flags: dismissiveness of certain questions or opinions
communication.summary: The maintainer provides detailed and technically sound responses, but can come across as somewhat defensive and dismissive, which may deter new contributors.

concerns: No commits in past 6 months despite last commit being recent (2025-12-15)
27 open issues with no recent activity or resolution
No closed issues in past 6 months indicating lack of maintenance
No merged PRs in past 6 months showing no active development
Zero active contributors in past 6 months
Unknown last release date suggests release process has stalled
positive_signals: Recent commit exists (2025-12-15) suggesting repository hasn't been deleted
maintenance.summary: The ugrep package appears abandoned with no maintenance activity over 6 months despite a recent commit, accumulating unresolved issues and lacking active development or contributor engagement.

governance.summary: The governance documentation for ugrep lacks a clear succession plan, decision-making process, and contributor ladder, indicating a high bus factor risk.

analysis_summary.doc_summary: The README provides a comprehensive overview of the ugrep package, but lacks clear installation instructions and troubleshooting guidance.
concerns: no commits in the past 6 months
Docs: Installation instructions are not provided in the README.
Communication: dismissiveness of certain questions or opinions
Governance: High bus factor risk identified
